Glen Innes arrest: Man knocks gun from fleeing driver’s hand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/glen-innes-arrest-man-knocks-gun-from-fleeing-drivers-hand/RKMVYFL3NZEEZKA6PP7EKJEA4Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/glen-innes-arrest-man-knocks-gun-from-fleeing-drivers-hand/RKMVYFL3NZEEZKA6PP7EKJEA4Y/ Jaime LythHead Hunter associate faces host of charges after dramatic armed stand-off Wed, 20 Nov 2024 22:06:19 +0000 Footage has emerged of the dramatic arrest of an armed man driving erratically in Glen Innes, which left one person in a serious condition. The video shows a black car driving on the grass in a reserve near Leybourne Circle. Photo / via video
